Introduction

Space A (Korean: 스페이스 A; Japanese: スペースA) is a South Korean co-ed group. They released their first album "Space A 1집" in October 1997. They split up in 2002 and focused on their individual careers. They reunited in February 2013, with a single called "Re-turn" and added two new female members.
